title: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: When using code assist, the file appears to be dirtied even though no changes have been made. Additionally, the code assist does not appear as expected.
EB: After using code assist, the file should remain unchanged and there should be no indication of dirtiness. The code assist should also appear as expected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a file in the editor. 
2. Trigger the code assist feature by typing a specific key combination or using the menu option. 
3. Observe that the file is marked as dirty even though no changes were made. 
4. Verify that the code assist does not appear as expected.
